item.title: Using Claws Mail Client
item.description: Contents Why Install Add Account Compose Email FAQ Why? Why use an email-client? I do not know. Except that using an external email-client seems like a grown-up thing to do, like owning a wallet. Why use Claws Mail? I guess because it uses less resource than others. But, having a modern computer, that sounds more like an excuse than a valid reason. Basically, the reason will depend on the user.
